name: Chibi Akuma's Episode 1: Invasion!
summary:
Chibiko isn't the best choice for the 'hero' of a game... in the last year she's been killed by God, banished from hell, and reincarnated as the enemy of all mankind!

But, she's not going to let any of that get her down!... in fact, the only problem she has right now is the strange monsters that have been lurking around the mountains lately - and now they are infesting HER castle!

Join Chibiko in her unholy battle against the invasion of badly drawn, cliche and generally uninspired enemies, pummel your way through 4 levels of brainless firepower crazy action - and unleash hell on the 4 end level boss enemies!
